214005.en:
I've staked out a special seat to hear His Majesty Quard's statement. It's such a natural disaster! Even if he's
still recovering from his injuries, there's no way His Majesty could have missed it.
214005.ja:
ã€Œç‰¹ç­‰å¸­ã§ã€€ã‚¯ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ‰é™›ä¸‹ã® ã€€å£°æ˜ã‚’èããŸã‚ã«ã€€å‡ºå¼µã£ã¦ããŸã‚“ã ã€‚
ã€Œã“ã‚Œã ã‘ã®ã€€å¤©å¤‰åœ°ç•°ã ï¼ ã€€ãŸã¨ãˆã€€ã‚±ã‚¬ã®æ²»ç™‚ä¸­ã§ã‚ã£ã¦ã‚‚ ã€€é™›ä¸‹ã®ãŠè€³ã«ã€€å…¥ã‚‰ã¬ã‚ã‘ãŒãªã„ã—ãªã€‚

214007.en:
To look at it, it's a cloud of noxious color. You mean to tell me that the calamity wasn't over with the
earthquakes, meteorites, and monster attacks?

214009.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Good, good, good, the meteor has
vanished! What does this have to do
with the color of the sky?

214011.en:
I've been feeling a little under the weather since a while ago. It's like having a hangover. I was in high
spirits before the sky turned like this.

214013.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Look at this <pc>. This sky
looks like the end of the world!<bw_break>

214015.en:
Oh, it looks like the end of the world, doesn't it? I can't believe the sun is shining. If I can't grow
flowers, my flower shop will finally go under.

214017.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>Oh, God! Has the final judgment been
passed on us? This disastrous sky is
the answer to the human race!

214019.en:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>We will make a statement on this
anomaly as soon as we are ready. Until
then, please stay at home.

214021.en:
A parade of bizarre phenomena that will pique the curiosity of the Abangiardo in you. I can't take my
eyes off the spectacle!

214023.en:
It was so noisy outside that I couldn't help but come out to see this. In all my life, I've never seen
the sky tinted with such a beautiful color. I can only describe it as ominous.

214025.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>I have never seen such a bizarre
scenery in all my life. But still,
what is this seasick feeling?

214027.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>A soldier never leaves his post, even
in the midst of an end-of-the-world
situation!

214029.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Oh! Thank you! Thank you! The Eternal
Ring must have obliterated the giant
meteorite. Thank you.

214031.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Look, look~! The meteorite is gone~!
It was an eyesore, so it's super
Drang~!

214033.en:
Ha-ha-ha. I must get to Linka-sama as soon as possible. In this emergency, I can't leave Linka alone for a long
time. Now is the time to show my butler's determination!

214035.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>It's crazy how full they are all of a
sudden. I told Nancy to get away, but
she wouldn't listen to me.

214037.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>You're a reliable fellow, aren't you?
If you do well, I'll buy you a drink!

214039.en:
No, no, no, you are not allowed in the Royal Army Ward at this time. And you're not staying here because you'll
be a distraction to the military.

214041.en:
Another natural cataclysm following the meteorite. Is it to remind us that God is thoroughly powerless over us
humans?

214043.en:
. I ask you with all my heart, Kyu. Causality Manipulation is a divine art that fixes only the time of the Kyuronos
defeated by us at that point in time, and returns the time of all other things to the time before their extinction! In other words,
it is possible to regenerate this world with the existence of the Kyuronos extinguished! However, I must warn you that manipulating
causality is an extremely difficult and dangerous venture. If you fail, Kyuronos will be resurrected and everything will be back to
square one. Rather than take the risk of crossing the dangerous bridge, you can choose to live a carefree life in a world where
Kyuronos has been defeated. Please think about it carefully. Which do you choose, to rebuild the world or to live in this world now? Live in this world Rebuild the world
214043.ja:
ã€Œã€‚å¿ƒã—ã¦ã€€èãã‚­ãƒ¥ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€å› æœå¾‹æ“ä½œã¨ã¯â€¦â€¦â€¦â€¦
ã€Œãƒœã‚¯ã‚‰ã«å€’ã•ã‚ŒãŸã€€ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ­ãƒã‚¹ã®æ™‚é–“ã®ã¿ã‚’ ã€€ãã®æ™‚ç‚¹ã§å›ºå®šã—ã€€ãã‚Œä»¥å¤–ã®ã€€ã‚ã‚‰ã‚†ã‚‹ç‰©ã® ã€€æ™‚é–“ã‚’ã€€æ»…äº¡å‰ã«æˆ»ã›ã‚‹ã¨ã„ã†ã€€ç¥æ¥­ã ã‚­ãƒ¥ï¼

ã€Œå¤±æ•—ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã€€ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ­ãƒã‚¹ãŒå¾©æ´»ã—ã¦ ã€€ã™ã¹ã¦ã¯ã€€ãµã‚Šã ã—ã«æˆ»ã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã†ã‚­ãƒ¥ã‚ˆâ€¦â€¦ã€‚
ã€Œãƒ ãƒªã—ã¦ã€€ã‚ã¶ãªã„æ©‹ã‚’æ¸¡ã‚‹ã‚ˆã‚Šã‚‚ ã€€ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ­ãƒã‚¹ã‚’å€’ã—ãŸã€€ã“ã®ä¸–ç•Œã§ã®ã‚“ã³ã‚Šæš®ã‚‰ã™ ã€€â€¦â€¦ãã‚“ãªé¸æŠã‚‚ã€€ã‚ã‚‹ã‚­ãƒ¥ã€‚
ã€Œã‚ˆãã€€è€ƒãˆã¦ã»ã—ã„ã‚­ãƒ¥ã€‚ä¸–ç•Œã‚’å†ç”Ÿã•ã›ã‚‹ã‹ ã€€ä»Šã®ã“ã®ä¸–ç•Œã§ã€€ç”Ÿãã¦ã„ãã‹â€¦â€¦ ã€€ã¯ã€€ã©ã¡ã‚‰ã‚’ã€€ã®ãã‚€ã‚­ãƒ¥ï¼Ÿ ã“ã®ä¸–ç•Œã§ç”Ÿãã‚‹ ä¸–ç•Œã‚’å†ç”Ÿã•ã›ã‚‹

214045.en:
Living in this world is 's choice. has done well so far. It is also a bad kunai to rest your wings quietly
here as the end point of your journey. For the time being, I'll use the inn, but eventually I'd like to receive my own house. I'll think
about it. If you have any problems, not just about the house, I'll be happy to talk to you!

214047.en:
To make the world a better place, that's 's choice. It is important, so I would like to confirm your final decision. You
have decided to rebuild the world, despite the risks, haven't you?

214049.en:
I will not perform causal manipulation until I fully understand the dangers involved in bringing the world back to life. Let me
explain again what the dangers are. Let me know if you want to hear it.

214051.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>The resolve of <pc> was conveyed to
Cu.

214053.en:
Come to think of it, the director of Royal Alchemia's house is vacant. The housing problem will be solved soon. However, it is a
little too big for me and to live in. What's wrong? You don't seem very enthusiastic about it. I'll ask you one more
time just to be sure.Which do you want to do, rebuild the world or live in this world now? Live in this world Rebuild the world
214053.ja:
ã€Œãã†ã„ãˆã°ã€€ç‹ç«‹ã‚¢ãƒ«ã‚±ãƒŸã‚¢ã®æ‰€é•·ã®å®¶ãŒ ã€€ç©ºãå®¶ã«ã€€ãªã£ã¦ã„ãŸã‚­ãƒ¥ã­ã€‚ ã€€ä½ã¾ã„ã®å•é¡Œã¯ã€€æ—©ã€…ã«è§£æ±ºã—ãã†ã‚­ãƒ¥ã€‚

ã€Œå¿µã®ãŸã‚ã€€ã‚‚ã†ä¸€åº¦ã€€èã„ã¦ãŠãã‚­ãƒ¥ã€‚ ã€€ä¸–ç•Œã‚’å†ç”Ÿã•ã›ã‚‹ã‹ã€€ä»Šã®ã“ã®ä¸–ç•Œã§ç”Ÿãã‚‹ã‹ ã€€ã¯ã€€ã©ã¡ã‚‰ã‚’ã€€ã®ãã‚€ã‚­ãƒ¥ï¼Ÿ ã“ã®ä¸–ç•Œã§ç”Ÿãã‚‹ ä¸–ç•Œã‚’å†ç”Ÿã•ã›ã‚‹

214055.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Oh, I'm still fluffla. I got really dizzy and
almost fainted earlier.<bw_break>

214057.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Hey, I can't see the meteorite. What does that
mean? Do you see it?<yesno><break>

214059.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Oh, no! Am I the only one suffering from some
kind of witchcraft? That's why the sky looks
so strange.

214061.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>I guess I'm not hallucinating after all. I'm
glad the meteorite disappeared, but the color
of this sky is weird.

214065.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr><turn_pc>Heaven has given me a chance to humiliate
myself. If Hexabeast appears again, let him be
the rust of my sword!

214067.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>What a dazzling sky! It was sunny just a few
moments ago, but in an instant it was covered
with dark clouds.

214069.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>The Eternal Ring is full of liquid! I can't
wait to see what happens. This is a once in a
lifetime experience!

214071.en:
Oh, that's terrible! The meteorite I was going to turn into gold has disappeared! That meteorite was the fountain of my strength to
endure the hard days of my training. What's going to happen to my dream?
214071.ja:
ã€Œã‚ï½ã€€ã‚µã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¯ã£ã—ã‚‡ï¼ï¼ ã€€ã‚¢ãƒ†ã‚·ãŒã€€é‡‘å¡Šã«å¤‰ãˆã‚‹ã¤ã‚‚ã‚Šã ã£ãŸ ã€€éš•çŸ³ãŒã€€æ¶ˆãˆã¦ã‚‹ã—ï¼
ã€Œã‚ã®éš•çŸ³ã ã‘ãŒã€€ãƒ„ãƒ©ã‚¤ä¿®è¡Œã®æ—¥ã€…ã‚’è€ãˆã‚‹ ã€€ãŒã‚“ã°ã‚Šã®æºæ³‰ã ã£ãŸã—ã‚‡â€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€ã‚¢ãƒ†ã‚·ã®å¤¢ã€€ã©ã†ãªã£ã¡ã‚ƒã†ã‚“ï¼ï¼Ÿ

214073.en:
Oh, look! Look at all the mysterious liquid stuck in the Eternal Ring. I wonder if it's all right. I'm worried that the contents will
overflow.

214075.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I wish Mikhail could see this view. I'm sure
it will inspire her to write wonderful poems.

214077.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>Stay in your homes for now, because you never
know what might happen. It could be a sign of
Hexabeast emerging like last time.

214079.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Is it finally over for us? Dad, Mom, Shante,
is it time to go to them?<bw_break>

214081.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>I got dizzy for a second and passed out. I
don't know how long I was blacked out, but
when I woke up, I was just a little bit sad.

214083.en:
<attr><feel_think_one><end_attr>The sky is the most eerie color I've ever
seen. It's like the end of the world. If His
Majesty Quard were here.<bw_break>

214085.en:
The way I see it, it must be the Eternal Ring that made the meteorites disappear. So this weird sky color is just a side effect of the
meteorite disappearance. It should return to normal after one night!

214087.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>I wonder what will happen. I would be lying if
I said I was scared of Kunai, but I'm feeling
very calm.<bw_break>

214093.en: Egley's knees are shaking as he looks closely.

214095.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>I got dizzy while cooking and almost splashed
the contents of the pot. Somehow I managed to
hold it together.<bw_break>

214097.en:
There is something wrong with the Eternal Ring, even though Mereade did not manipulate it. It could not be the prelude to an
explosion, could it? The light blue magical creature that was talking with you also flew toward the Eternal Ring. You don't know what
kind of danger you are in.

214099.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>A young man with the habit of saying ''Cu'' in
his mouth was flying around the school. Maybe
he's still around.

214101.en:
Oh, it was so noisy outside, I couldn't help but come out here! Even from here I can feel the birds and beasts buzzing about! There's
been a great upheaval here on the island!

214103.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>I heard that the reason the Eternal Ring rose
to the surface when the meteorite fell was
because Mr. Mereade manipulated it.<bw_break>

224777.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>What would Mr. Quard do in such a situation?
What would you say?

224779.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>And then I noticed the sky, right? I wonder if
I'm being shown a hazy vision.

224781.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>No, not yet! I'm going to live with her. I
swore to protect her this time!<bw_break>

224783.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>If the end of the world is coming, come on.
This alchemist Linka will work miracles again
and again!

224785.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>No, I am in charge of the kingdom now. I must
be firm to keep my promise to Mr. Mereade.

224787.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Because you are right next to me. Even if the
sky falls and the world crumbles, I can keep
singing for you.<bw_break>

224789.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I'm sure the real me was also singing for you
at the theater in Rinjahar. Until the very
last moment.

224791.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Then I heard a strange noise, and when I went
outside, you know what I found? I don't like
the atmosphere.

224793.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>I had expected that Mereade might have been
responsible for the recent anomaly, but he was
nowhere to be found in Royal City.

229732.en:
We are blessed with good fortune! Two miracles happened at the same time! The first miracle was that Kyuronos, whom we defeated, left
behind a tremendous amount of time-traveling power. The second was that Mereade, who had been trapped in Time Spring in the world 5000
years ago, sent the Ethene Kingdom back in time to the present day. Through these two miracles, the Eternal Ring quickly absorbed
the power of Kyuronos' time travel and filled up! What this means is that the Eternal Ring's ultimate secret of causality manipulation,
which can only be used when it is full, is now possible!

229734.en:
. I ask you with all my heart, Kyu. Causality Manipulation is a divine art that fixes only the time of the Kyuronos
defeated by us at that point in time, and returns the time of all other things to the time before their extinction! In other words,
it is possible to regenerate this world with the existence of the Kyuronos extinguished! However, I must warn you that manipulating
causality is an extremely difficult and dangerous venture. If you fail, Kyuronos will be resurrected and everything will be back to
square one. Rather than take the risk of crossing the dangerous bridge, you can choose to live a carefree life in a world where
Kyuronos has been defeated. Please think about it carefully. Which do you choose, to rebuild the world or to live in this world now? Live in this world Rebuild the world

238967.en:
There's no response when I try to talk to them, but it seems they can't see us. Would you like to finish your search here and move
to Royal City Kimbel?
